snippet: The deputy director at the Office of Management and Budget sent a letter to Speaker John Boehner and Senate majority leader Harry Reid with recommendations to Congress on how Hurricane Sandy recovery funds should be used.
lead_paragraph: The deputy director at the Office of Management and Budget sent a letter to Speaker John Boehner and Senate majority leader Harry Reid with recommendations to Congress on how Hurricane Sandy recovery funds should be used.

headline.main: Letter to Congress on Hurricane Sandy Funding
